Posts.EditableText:
Hi!
I just finished my first game, its a medium length text adventure about a kitten's quest for cookies! Please tell me if you find any typos or glitches, or if a puzzle is too hard to figure out.

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/rswzblydiumggmqe6k8qta/cookies-a-cat-adventure

Thanks!
